column4: Do I need the samba package installed in order to browse Windows shares, or just samba-common ?
you need smbclient
yes, you can shoot yourself in the foot like that
cool, how?
you can edit the sudoers file and let some users require no password. then sudo won't bother them with one
this of course is a very silly thing to do
man sudoers. you can do that too
you just don't want to read a man page :)
including the crackers and broken programs etc.
sounds sane. although you seem to have a buggy system too
some tv cards can support dual console and tv out, mine can't
you can change the desktop font at system -> preferences -> fonts
how about for non-desktop?
all the configureable font settings are there
so it's not possible to make my icon font larger except the desktop?
you mean in the file manager?
I mean I have folders and when I open them the fonts are difficult to read
File, About tells me it's Nautilus
looks like chaning the application font applies to those to
thanks
if it works, cool
well, things mostly work.. had to ditch firefox and use mozilla because firefox seems to be broken in breezy .. no fonts
oh yeah, you were asking for firefox help before. couldn't help with that
np.. thanks for your font help.. I can see again :)
